mapper.insert: insert into tbl_recipe_pic(r_pno, r_picture, r_cno) values(seq_recipe_pic_pno.nextval, #{r_picture}, #{r_cno})
insert into tbl_recipe_content(r_cno, r_content, r_bno) values(#{r_cno}, #{r_content}, #{r_bno})
insert into tbl_recipe_board (r_bno, r_title, r_titlepic, r_explain, r_cooktip, userid, f_code) values (#{r_bno}, #{r_title}, #{r_titlepic}, #{r_explain}, #{r_cooktip}, #{userid}, #{f_code})
insert into tbl_ingredient_list (lno, r_bno, i_name, i_amount) values(seq_ingredient_list_lno.nextval, #{r_bno}, #{i_name}, #{i_amount})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_recipe_board b join tbl_foodtype_code c on b.f_code = c.f_code where r_bno = #{r_bno}
select c.r_content, p.r_picture from tbl_recipe_board b inner join tbl_recipe_content c on b.r_bno = c.r_bno inner join tbl_recipe_pic p on c.r_cno = p.r_cno where b.r_bno = #{r_bno} order by c.r_cno
select r_content from tbl_recipe_content where r_bno = #{r_bno}
select r_picture from tbl_recipe_pic where r_bno = #{r_bno}
select * from tbl_ingredient i join tbl_ingredient_list l on i.i_name = l.i_name where r_bno = #{r_bno} order by l.lno asc
select userid from tbl_recipe_board where r_bno = #{r_bno}

select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_recipe_board
order by r_regdate desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

choose.when: where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
